title: Payless punks fashionistas by opening a fake luxury store and inviting them to comment on its 'designer' shoes
excerpt: Bargain shoe chain Payless recently took over a Santa Monica retail shop and turned it into Palessi, a luxury store selling their bargain shoes. Then they invited influencers to theâ€¦

title: Why Sephora merged its digital and physical retail teams into one departmen
excerpt: Since the teams were combined, Sephora's customer profiles have been rebuilt to include 360-degree data that tracks in-store purchases, interactions with sales people, online browsing and online purchasing.
